short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hides sections that you specify on the Google News homepage.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: If you frequently use the Google News page but want to stop seeing certain sections, just use this handy extension. Click on the extension's icon and put a checkmark by the sections you want to hide, then reload the News page.
